title: Sign in / up
description: All user information is recorded in localstorage. When you fill in some fields, there is a check for their privilege, for example, for a name, there must be at least three letters and no numbers. If you forgot your password, you can erase localstorage.
I did this project in a course, so we didn't download any plugins or libraries to develop the logic.

title: Posts
description: Creating a post in a social network
You can choose a user, write text and attach a string to the photo of the new post. You can also put likes.
I did this project in a course, so we didn't download any plugins or libraries to develop the logic.

description: Points are counted, and if there is a tie, one is added to everyone

title: Tetris
description: All functionality is present, you can control the buttons on the screen or on the keyboard. Difficulty levels are present (figures fall faster). There are 5 levels, the difference between them is 500 points
I did it by repeating the video from YouTube. I was just learning js on my own
